reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, with one noting it looks and feels like a million dollars, and appreciate its quality, stretchiness, and comfort. The dress is true to size and works well for formal occasions like holiday parties and Royal Christmas work events. Customers describe the material as perfect and flattering, with one mentioning how it accentuates their body. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it amazing while others note the length is a little off. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's stretchy
items.body: The dress is nicely fitted overall and looks really good on. I ordered it in a 2XL, but an XL or 1XL would have given me a more perfect fit around the bust area, as it felt slightly loose. Other than that, the dress is comfortable, flattering, and I’m happy with my purchase. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Elegant
items.body: This dress is incredibly comfortable. And being a kind of tall girl at 5’8 I was surprised how it still draped down to the floor. After having a baby five months ago and needing a fancy dress for Christmas party, I found this dress and have no regrets. I’m currently weighing about 160 pounds and it was perfect for reference. I’m wearing a size medium and a lot of other clothes. The material is soft and has some stretch. It’s incredibly flattering and I got a ton of compliments if you were looking for a velvet formal dress. You can’t go wrong with this one Read more
items.author: Bretagne Stowe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Velvety Perfection
items.body: Very flattering. Lots of stretch. Great quality. Perfect for plus size formal. I’m five 5 1/2 so it was a tad bit long even with 3.9 inch heels on. I had to hold the tail of the dress up to climb stairs. Split is pretty high but still tasteful. Read more
items.author: The Harvey’s

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable dress
items.body: Purchased a size M. I’m 5’3. 140lbs then. This Was a very beautiful and comfortable dress. Very affordable! The material was great, the fit was awesome and shoulders didnt move up. Read more
items.author: Denise

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Beautiful dress. I am 5’9, 150 pounds, bra size is 36B. This dress is definitely made for a bustier (is that a word) woman. My boobs did not fill it the best but the dress was still beautiful. I ordered a medium. Read more
items.author: PENNY ECKLES

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Quality not great.
items.body: The length was a little off and the rouching wasnt sitting where the the pictures showed. However, my biggest issue was that as soon as I opened the bag, it reeked of stale cigarettes. It felt like I walked into a bar in the 80's. The velvet was not soft enough for my taste either. Read more
items.author: Zuleima

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cosplay
items.body: Beautiful color and fabric is very soft BUT — the fabric is very THIN — looks and feels like the cheap “velveteen that it is. The padding in the bust cup is crooked and cannot be easily removed to fix without taking a seam a loose. The hem is not finished all the way around and the split is very HIGH and very WIDE. This is suitable for Cosplay, a school theater production or cruise ship formal night. Definitely would NOT wear FOR a FORMAL BLACK TIE EVENT OR WEDDING. Read more
items.author: FleurDeLis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars JUST GET THE DRESS
items.body: I am 5'6" and weigh 225 pounds. I opted for the XL and it fit like a glove. I received several compliments. It was comfortable, great for the part indoor part outdoor winter wedding we attended. The rouching took eyes away from my apron belly. Quality is fine. It is on the thinner side but that attributes to the stretch which is a good thing! I would have normally purchase a 2x and I am so glad I sized down! Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal High Split Cocktail Split Maxi Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal High Split Cocktail Split Maxi Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Blue, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
